name: DOZA 2: NOVOGODNIY PEREDOZ
description: Embark on a MAGICAL land, ruled by the good magician RutinDor to help him to quell the uprising of snowmen and overcome the evil dark wizard Lord Ovalny
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
